title: Finance director headed to RO - Grosse Pointe News (subscription)
content: Finance director headed to RO  Grosse Pointe News (subscription)
description: Debra Peck Lichtenberg GROSSE POINTE FARMS — After a five-year run as the Grosse Pointe Farms director of finance and operations, Debra Peck Lichtenberg soon will move on to a new opportunity as finance director of Royal Oak. Her last day with the Farms will be Wednesday, June 1. “I always feel that in order
